sentences.en: Alas, my informality caused the students to have absolutely no fear of me.
sentences.cn: 唉, 我的非正式称呼导致学生对我无所畏惧.

sentences.en: Beside the difference between speech and writing there is a difference between formality and informality.
sentences.cn: 除了有口语体与书面语体的区别外,还有正式和非正式语气的区别.

sentences.en: Eleanor enjoyed the relative informality of island life.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺喜欢岛上相对轻松随意的生活。

sentences.en: Encourage informality and a relaxed company climate.
sentences.cn: 在公司里,提倡非正式,轻松的气氛.

sentences.en: Have been seduced by informality of messaging medium into flirting with office scoundrel.
sentences.cn: 先被电子邮件引诱,又和公司的流氓调情.

sentences.en: I should never mistake informality for insolence.
sentences.cn: 我决不会把不拘礼节错认为蛮横无礼.

sentences.en: It has very close links to industry and characterised by creativity, flexibility, agility, pragmatism and informality.
sentences.cn: 该教育系统与工业有着紧密的联系和合作,并以创造性 、 机动性 、 灵敏性 、 实用性和开拓性著称.

sentences.en: Other groups such as the Church of God conduct their services with much more informality and a greater display of emotion.
sentences.cn: 上帝会等其他团体做礼拜时不大拘泥形式,情感也就更加外露.

sentences.en: Our country's psychological counseling has been in of informality and non - career a period of years.
sentences.cn: 我国的心理咨询长期以来一直处于非正规化和 非 职业化的尴尬境地.

sentences.en: Pseudocode strikes aprecarious balance between the understandability and informality of English and the precision of code.
sentences.cn: (因为)伪代码平衡了英语(自然语言)的易理解性和非形式所带来的模糊性与代码的精确性之的矛盾.

sentences.en: Slang: Nonstandard vocabulary of informality, usually not limited to any region.
sentences.cn: 俚语: 极不正式的 、 不标准的词汇,一般而言并不限定在那个地区使用.

sentences.en: This informality made the war a lot of fun for Scarlett.
sentences.cn: 这种不正常的状况使思嘉觉得战争还是相当有趣的.

sentences.en: This technique led to informality of pose and a sense of presence that was remarkable.
sentences.cn: 这一技术使被摄人物姿态变得随意,并带有突出的生动感.

words.tran_cn: 非正式的；不拘礼节的；通俗的；日常使用的
